titleStmt.title: A sermon against rebellion shewing deceivers to be deceived in their wicked mistakes. Preached at St. Paul's, October 20th 1661. By Sam. Stone, M.A.
titleStmt.author: Stone, Samuel, 1602-1663.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome at the Gun in Ivy-lane,

notesStmt.note: With an advertisement on the final page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
